EmailTemplate.name: YCS request for information letter
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Thank you for reaching out to YETI Coolers! We are honored by your request to customize your drinkware. We have a talented team of artists waiting to create your magic. We want to make sure you receive exceptional customer service and a quality product.
We are managing the number of orders we can efficiently manage per week. Attached to this letter you will find a request for information we need to approve your request for process. We ask for your assistance completing the document and returning it to this email address.
Please note:
· Allow 8 weeks from approval to delivery (Logos that require licensing approval can take an additional 4 weeks)
· Minimum order = 120 pieces
· Allow 7 days for your order to be approved for processing – Once approved changes cannot be made and no refunds will be granted
We look forward to receiving your request and we will send you an email regarding the status of your application. If approved, we can move forward with your request.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname}
The YETI Outfitters
512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com
